bio.summary: I'm a self-taught programmer that is always willing to learn and push beyond my comfort zone. I love helping people learn about the world of science and technology, that’s why I've volunteered years to multiple causes. I have even created my own non-profit organization to further the student’s accessibility to science and technology.

work.summary: A non-profit organization that I founded that hosts an online parts database for FRC teams.
highlights: Solo developed an entire Ruby on Rails Application from the ground up.
Developed an iOS Application for regional events to inventory their parts.

work.summary: The planning committee helps plan the FRC Orlando Regional Event. I am helping by volunteering my time to redesign there website for the Orlando Regional.
Helped the students build a robot for the regional competition, also helped setup fundraisers and sponsors.
Built a fully custom Rapidweaver theme for my high school robotics team to use on their website.

publications.name: Nature Coast takes gold in robotics
Hernando's RoboSharks Spark Creativity, Teamwork To Stand Tall In World Competition
